description.raw:
Implementation of ROS2 testing for gazebo\_ros2\_pkgs:

* Use DSL to generate the gazebo\_ros2\_pkgs
* ROS2 support in release-tools by setting the `USE_ROS2`variable to true \(default is false\).

Tested:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=_dsl_gazebo_ros_pkgs&build=364)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/\_dsl\_gazebo\_ros\_pkgs/364/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo_ros_pkgs/364)


* 

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_bouncy-bionic-amd64&build=7)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_bouncy-bionic-amd64/7/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_bouncy-bionic-amd64/7)\)
